alert.note: Alert for Redwood (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:03PM CDT until April 20 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Redwood River near Redwood Falls affecting Redwood County. .The combination of snow melt runoff and forecast rainfall will continue to keep river flows increased. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Redwood River near Redwood Falls. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Swayback bridge in Redwood Falls overtopped. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 900 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 8.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 900 PM CDT Friday was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon and continue falling to 5.0 feet next Friday evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on 03/13/1973. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
